entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 12:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over southern sections in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
